description.en: Basic identity information about a separated or unaccompanied child.
description.fr: Basic identity information about a separated or unaccompanied child.
description.ar: Basic identity information about a separated or unaccompanied child.
description.zh: Basic identity information about a separated or unaccompanied child.
description.es: Basic identity information about a separated or unaccompanied child.
description.ru: Basic identity information about a separated or unaccompanied child.

help_text.en: A separated child is any person under the age of 18, separated from both parents or from his/her previous legal or customary primary care giver, but not necessarily from other relatives. An unaccompanied child is any person who meets those criteria but is ALSO separated from his/her relatives.
help_text.fr: A separated child is any person under the age of 18, separated from both parents or from his/her previous legal or customary primary care giver, but not necessarily from other relatives. An unaccompanied child is any person who meets those criteria but is ALSO separated from his/her relatives.

display_name.es: Additional Info That Could Help In Tracing?
display_name.ru: Additional Info That Could Help In Tracing?

help_text.en: Such as key persons/location in the life of the child who/which might provide information about the location of the sought family -- e.g. names of religious leader, market place, etc. Please ask the child where he/she thinks relatives and siblings might be, and if the child is in contact with any family friends. Include any useful information the caregiver provides.
